about_the_game:
Sweet Escape - is an escape game. Players need to control a girl to escape from a room full of tentacles. If she is touched by the tentacles, she will be XXX.

There are ten girls to choose from in the game, and they will be sent to a random room each time. Come and help the girls escape from the room full of tentacles.

Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out of images in viewing mode
On most pages, the "Esc" key returns to the previous page
Press the "R" key during the game to restart directly in the same room

content_descriptors.notes:
Sweet Escape - is an escape game in which the player needs to control a girl to escape from a room full of tentacles. If she is touched by the tentacles, she will be sexually assaulted, abused, tied up, and raped.

- Not suitable for watching at work
- Not suitable for all ages
- Explicit and frequent nudity
- The act of inserting or not inserting large amounts of tentacles and mucus into the mouth, vagina, or anus
- The game contains female nudity, violence, sexual assault, sexual abuse, sexual bondage, xeno sexual rape, non-consensual sex and porno graphics scenes
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old

Sweet Escape - is an escape game. Players need to control a girl to escape from a room full of tentacles. If she is touched by the tentacles, she will be XXX.

There are ten girls to choose from in the game, and they will be sent to a random room each time. Come and help the girls escape from the room full of tentacles.

Use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out of images in viewing mode
On most pages, the "Esc" key returns to the previous page
Press the "R" key during the game to restart directly in the same room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
